Eskhaton

April 4–6, 2019

Reverie Studios is proud to announce their brand new blockbuster larp, Eskhaton. This is a cosmic horror larp that focuses on the experiences of cultists worshipping Elder Gods that are gathering to celebrate the end of the world. Their belief will help shape which apocalypse happens, and will test the limits of the rationality and self-interest.

Learn more about this event.

A Cog in the Machine II

October 12–14, 2018

We will be running ‘A Cog in the Machine’ at HLG Convention in October of 2018, as well as participating in the development of a blockbuster-style larp in collaboration with six other studios.

Learn more about this event.

A Cog in the Machine I

May 16, 2018

The first run of our brand new larp about what happens when a cataclysmic event occurs and a ‘shadow government’ assumes control in the United States. You portray a member of this government and may come from any walk in life: a teacher, a logistics planner, a community organizer. What will you do when faced with this responsibility?

Learn more about this event.
